Monologue.Current: Большой проказник{Line}“Блииин, как скучно!..{Line} Поскорей бы {Char Zell} вернулся!..”
Monologue.Original: Big Bad Rascal{Line}“Ergh, I’m so bored...{Line} I wish Zell would come over...”

Monologue.Current: Big Bad Rascal{Line}“Yo, Zell!”
Monologue.Original: Big Bad Rascal{Line}“Yo, Zell!”

Monologue.Current: Zell{Line}“Yo!{Line} S’up, Trouble Maker!”
Monologue.Original: Zell{Line}“Yo!{Line} S’up, Trouble Maker!”

Monologue.Current: Big Bad Rascal{Line}“Zell, your ma’s{Line} baby-sittin’ me again!”
Monologue.Original: Big Bad Rascal{Line}“Zell, your ma’s{Line} baby-sittin’ me again!”

Monologue.Current: “I ain’t causin’ her no trouble.{Line} Your ma can be pretty strict, too.”
Monologue.Original: “I ain’t causin’ her no trouble.{Line} Your ma can be pretty strict, too.”

Monologue.Current: “I better be good now that you’re here.{Line} I’m strong and all, but I can’t take{Line} both you and your ma on.”
Monologue.Original: “I better be good now that you’re here.{Line} I’m strong and all, but I can’t take{Line} both you and your ma on.”

Monologue.Current: “It’s like a double punch, y’know.{Line} I’d get KO’d just like that.”
Monologue.Original: “It’s like a double punch, y’know.{Line} I’d get KO’d just like that.”

Monologue.Current: Big Bad Rascal{Line}“...Playin’ dead.”
Monologue.Original: Big Bad Rascal{Line}“...Playin’ dead.”

Monologue.Current: Big Bad Rascal{Line}“I hate naps!”
Monologue.Original: Big Bad Rascal{Line}“I hate naps!”

Monologue.Current: Big Bad Rascal{Line}“I’ve been a{Line} pretty good boy today.”
Monologue.Original: Big Bad Rascal{Line}“I’ve been a{Line} pretty good boy today.”

Monologue.Current: Big Bad Rascal{Line}“......”
Monologue.Original: Big Bad Rascal{Line}“......”

Monologue.Current: “All I did was bring back a frog.”
Monologue.Original: “All I did was bring back a frog.”

Monologue.Current: “All I did was sign my name.{Line} I heard someone say the value{Line} goes up if there’s a signature.”
Monologue.Original: “All I did was sign my name.{Line} I heard someone say the value{Line} goes up if there’s a signature.”

Monologue.Current: “Oh yeah!{Line} I found somethin’ really cool!”
Monologue.Original: “Oh yeah!{Line} I found somethin’ really cool!”

Monologue.Current: “I hid it in your room,{Line} under your pillow, Zell!”
Monologue.Original: “I hid it in your room,{Line} under your pillow, Zell!”

Monologue.Current: Big Bad Rascal{Line}“I’m gonna keep{Line} today’s events{Line} ‘Top Secret’!”
Monologue.Original: Big Bad Rascal{Line}“I’m gonna keep{Line} today’s events{Line} ‘Top Secret’!”

Monologue.Current: Big Bad Rascal{Line}“Better not tell anyone!”
Monologue.Original: Big Bad Rascal{Line}“Better not tell anyone!”

Monologue.Current: An old issue of [Timber Maniacs]{Line}{Pause 48}...{Pause 48}...{Pause 48}...{Pause 48}...... NOT!
Monologue.Original: An old issue of [Timber Maniacs]{Line}{Pause 48}...{Pause 48}...{Pause 48}...{Pause 48}...... NOT!

Monologue.Current: “CARDS, CARDS, CARDS!”{Line}Yes{Line}No
Monologue.Original: “CARDS, CARDS, CARDS!”{Line}Yes{Line}No
